verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Prabhaava shaktulu kalgina raajunutimpu Deeni priyaatma ! korudu reni smarimpu Koodudido ! kinnera veenelatho Gaanamu cheyanulendi{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Sarvamu vinthaga paalana chesedu vaadu Rekkalatho ninu mosenu gaavuna baadu Neeku sadaa kaavali yundu gadaa Daani grahimpavadela{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Aatmanu! mikkili vinthagaa ninnu srujinchi Soukyamu nitchuchu snehamutho nadipinchi Kastamulo kappuchu rekkalatho Gaachina naadhunuthimpu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Snehapu varshamu neepai thaa guriyinchi Andaru choochuchu undagane karuninchi Deevenalu neeku nirathamu Nitchina naadhunuthimpu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Naadhuni naamamu naathma ! Smarinchi Nuthimpu oopiri galagina swaramaa neevu Nuthimpu sanghamulo nabraham santatitho Naadhu nuthimpumu{/lang-eng}
